item.title: About Eric Peña
item.description: I am a Complex Systems Science graduate student and Clifford D. Clark Fellow at State University of New York at Binghamton. Email: eric.pena@binghamton.edu Twitter: @ericpenaphysics Experience A, example, July 2018 - Present a (Data Analyst) Projects Website Notes, ericpena.com, April 2020 - Present a Education M.S., Systems Science, State University of New York at Binghamton, Binghamton, NY. 2021 Thesis: Cellular Automata Optimization using Genetic Algorithms Advanced Graduate Certificate, State University of New York at Binghamton, Binghamton, NY.
